title: An important consequence of the "tariff of abom...

content.question: An important consequence of the “tariff of abominations” (1828) is that it led to the

choices.label: enunciation of the doctrine of nullification
alliance of Southern planters and Western farmers
expansion of the New England textile industry

content.answer: enunciation of the doctrine of nullification

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
